text_block_list.text: I decided to let Sakura Bakushin O rest in the infirmary as she was getting tired.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Rest is an honor student's duty, you know! Right then, good night!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Mmu, where in the world…?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Yikes! Look, look, look! It's Ms. Sakura Bakushin O, our class president!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: It's your chance to say hello! Good morning! Class president!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's this!? What an ideal greeting! A very good morning to you, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Prime Minister from Somewhere
text_block_list.text: Sakura Bakushin O, your excellence is famous even in my country!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oyaya, you're that foreign guy who's on TV a lot…!?

text_block_list.name: Royalty from Somewhere
text_block_list.text: You are just magnificent! We're all Bakushin-ing, following your example!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu… Of course, you're right, spaceman. After all, I am――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am the honor student of the world! Class president of the galaxy! I am Sakura Bakushin O!!!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Wow…! Bakushin O! Bakushin O!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come on, everybody! Pure! Righteous! Bakushinbakushiiiiiiiiin!!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha! It seems to have been a dream.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But the class president, is a role model for the world……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This must be a prophetic dream!!
Waking up in a great mood, Sakura Bakushin O seems to have had enough rest.

text_block_list.name: Prime Minister from Somewhere
text_block_list.text: … I'm sorry to say, but it seems that there is a girl more qualified to be class president than you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wh…… What did you say――!?

text_block_list.name: Royalty from Somewhere
text_block_list.text: Next election, a clean vote. I'm going to vote for that other girl……

text_block_list.name: Alien
text_block_list.text: ※×＠■〇～…… Well, something like that. See ya later!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha, a dream!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Agghhh～! I have to work harder and harder to be worthy of being class president～……!
Sakura Bakushin O couldn't get much rest because her shoulders were so tense from her dream.
